userDataCheckDisagree.title: Is the information incorrect?
userDataCheckDisagree.detail:
Unfortunately, you cannot update your business information during the process of opening of a business account.

Please visit any of our branches where we will be happy to assist you.

moreInfo.title: More information is required
moreInfo.detail: Please visit one of our branches where we can finalize the application together

contractDisagree.title: We can not continue without your consent
contractDisagree.detail: If you have any questions, we will be happy to answer them over the phone or in person at any of our branches.

api.title: Oops, something went wrong
api.detail: We can’t continue right now, please try again later.

scoring.title: We are sorry, something went wrong
scoring.detail: We can’t continue in the app but we will be happy to help you at one of our branches - please remember to take your ID with you.

offer.title:
More Accounts for Your Business.
In CZK, EUR or USD
offer.showForeignAccount: Show business accounts in EUR / USD

products.title: Business PRO
bullets: All electronic transactions are free of charge (outgoing and incoming transactions, instant payments, and SEPA transfers)
Unlimited ATM withdrawals in the Czech Republic and abroad, and the possibility to deposit cash in both our own and <a href=\"smartbanka://open/path?ACTION=APPPAGE&URL=BRANCHESATMS\">shared ATMs
Two debit cards and electronic statements in online banking at no charge.
Smart services and partner discounts available directly in Smart Banka and Internet Banka.
Favorable exchange rates in our Online Exchange platform.

products.title: Genius Business Complete
bullets: All electronic transactions free of charge (incoming, outgoing, instant and SEPA payments).
ATM withdrawals in a network of shared ATMs free of charge.

products.title: Business Comfort
bullets: All electronic transactions free of charge (outgoing and incoming transactions, instant payments, and SEPA payments)
Unlimited ATM withdrawals in the Czech Republic and abroad, and the possibility to deposit cash in both our own and shared ATMs

The account includes a Business Premium card with additional services such as <a href="https://www.moneta.cz/pojisteni/cestovni-pojisteni-komfort">Komfort Travel Insurance and <a href="https://www.moneta.cz/pojisteni/pojisteni-debetni-platebni-karty">Personal Belongings and Payment Card Insurance, including membership in the <a href="https://www.moneta.cz/ucty-a-karty/priority-pass">Priority Pass program. Also includes two additional <a href="https://www.moneta.cz/ucty-a-karty/zivnostnici-a-firmy/debetni-karty">Business cards.
Smart services and partner discounts directly in Smart Banka and Internet Banka.
50% discount on foreign payments that are not included for free with the account
Online currency exchange with exclusive rates

richBullets.title: All electronic transactions free of charge (outgoing and incoming transactions, instant payments, and SEPA payments)
Unlimited ATM withdrawals in the Czech Republic and abroad, and the possibility to deposit cash in both our own and shared ATMs

The account includes a Business Premium card with additional services such as Komfort Travel Insurance and Personal Belongings and Payment Card Insurance, including membership in the Priority Pass program. Also includes two additional Business cards.
Smart services and partner discounts directly in Smart Bank and Internet Bank.
50% discount on foreign payments that are not included for free with the account
richBullets.detail: You will pay lower fees for outgoing payments in EUR outside the EEA and payments in other currencies, as well as for incoming payments in EUR from countries outside the EEA and payments in other currencies.

products.title: EUR Current Account
bullets: Open at no charge with no maintenance fees
With a debit card with no maintenance fees

products.title: USD Current Account
bullets: Open at no charge with no maintenance fees
With a debit card with no maintenance fees

contact.title: Would you like a physical or a virtual card?

options.title: Virtual card in your smartphone
options.description: Instead of a plastic physical card, you will be issued a virtual card. For payments and ATM withdrawals, just add it to your smartphone wallet.

options.title: Physical + virtual card
options.description: A regular physical plastic card as you know it. It can also be added to your smartphone wallet.

contactAddress.title: Contact address to receive the physical card
contactAddress.detail: Have you changed your shipping address? We will send the card to you as soon as possible. If you want to change your contact address, you can do it in Settings.

contactPin.title: Contact information to receive the PIN

cardDesign.title: Choose the look of your new card

click2Pay.title: Click to Pay has been enabled for your card on the e-shop
click2Pay.detail: Whenever you see the Click to Pay logo {0} while shopping, you can easily pay by entering your email. Your card details are securely stored in the Click to Pay system, which the merchant does not have access to. By proceeding, you agree to the terms of service, which will also be saved in your Documents. You can deactivate this service anytime in Smart Banka.
click2Pay.emailInfo: If you have multiple cards linked to one email, you can always choose which one to use.
click2Pay.emailError: We don't have your e-mail in contact information. Set it up in Settings.

additionalData.title: Final details
additionalData.companyTurnoverInfo: This is the total income (turnover) from your business for the past year. A rough estimate will suffice.
additionalData.netIncome: Your net income for the past year
additionalData.netIncomeInfo: This is the net income (turnover after deducting expenses and after tax) from your business for the past year. A rough estimate will suffice.
additionalData.houseHoldMonthlyIncomeDetail: This is the net monthly income from your business + other income of all household members. A rough estimate will suffice.

taxSection.titleHeader: Where do you pay your taxes?
taxSection.taxResidenceInfoBody: Enter your tax identification number in the country. Sometimes referred to as a TIN (Taxpayer Identification Number)

staticDocuments.title: Read the pre-contractual information and other documents
staticDocuments.subtitle: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents section.

waitingBeforeContract.title: Just a moment, we are preparing a contract for you

contract.title: Read the following documents
contract.detail: Signed documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents section.

signByUs.title: Now it is our turn to sign, just a moment.

productVictory.title:
Done!
The account {0} has been opened
productVictory.titleForeign:
Done!
The {0} account {1} has been opened.
productVictory.detailPlastic: ・The account will be active no later than the following business day. ・All important documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under Documents.. ・The debit card will be sent to: {address} It is usually delivered within 5 business days, but it can be added to your smartphone wallet and used right away.
productVictory.detailVirtual: ・The account will be active no later than the following business day. ・All important documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under Documents.

waiting.title: We are almost done. Signing the Agreement may take some time on our end.
waiting.detail:
During business days it should not take more than a couple of hours. On the weekends it will take until Monday. As soon as it is ready, you will be notified in Overview, the Agreement will be saved in ‘Documents’ and your Account will be activated.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

cosign.title: Request signed and sent to other approvers
cosign.detail:
You are done. In order for the request to be sent, it must be signed by other approvers according to the set signature rules. We will then open an account for you immediately, no later than the morning of the next working day.

You can find the application, related documents and product parameters in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents section.

prepared.title: Request sent to other approvers
prepared.detail:
You are done. In order for the request to be sent, it must be signed by other approvers according to the set signature rules. We will then open an account for you immediately, no later than the morning of the next working day.

You can find the application, related documents and product parameters in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents section.
